module.name: DISA
module.description: DISA Allows you "Direct Inward System Access". This gives you the ability to have an option on an IVR that gives you a dial tone, and you are able to dial out from the IssabelPBX machine as if you were connected to a standard extension. It appears as a Destination.
module.changelog: *2.12.0.0* Newer GUI, standarize module components *2.11.0.6* Initial Issabel Foundation release
